channel.title: Movies Hiromi on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: i == dumb
item.description: tonight I got home at 11:30 and wanted to watch a movie. so then when we were icking movies. soemhow we choose deer hunter. omg. so basically I made hiromi watch deer hunter with me at 12:15. wtf. I need sleep sooo bad. dumb me. gnight
